name: Sunshine blues juice
description: If you love berries then this juice recipe is for you.
ingredients: A simple blend of 1/2 cup blueberries , 1/2 cup blackberries ,2 freshly squeezed lemons , 1 tablespoon chopped ginger  1 cup water
steps: Blend all ingredient until smooth and strain through a sieve. Add some berry juice to your diet.

name: Green juice
description: This blend is prepared all the greens to give you a boost of energy. The same veggies that you should be eating, can now be added to your diet in the form of a juice.
ingredients: 4 handfuls of spinach , 1 leaf of kale , 1 cucumber ,peeled half lemon , one apple and a small carrot
steps: In a mixer add The ingredients Sieve it and your juice is ready. This blend makes an incredible detoxifier with a powerhouse of anti-oxidant and anti-inflammatory properties.

name: Pineapple and kale juice
description: Pineapple juices are pleasantly sweet to taste and mix in the goodness of kale, it makes for a great blend
ingredients: half a cup of freshly chopped pineapple , 1 green apple (cored) , a handful of cilantro , and 6 leaves of kale
steps: Blend all and serve the juice. The goodness of apples helps fight inflammation and boost heart health.

name: Active Apple
description: Apples make for a great juice ingredient as they have a sweet flavour and help mask other flavours.

steps: To make this juice combine the ingredients Celery is low in calorie and a good source of fibre, vitamin A, vitamin C, and vitamin K. Lemon is also an effective cleansing agent which makes this blend of juice health
